page.title: 07FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Angela writes:mum gets up first at 7am to turn the heating on. My dad goes to work in Aylsham at 8.15am. His work can take him to Wales. Michael and I get up at 8am. Mum works in Cromer for British Telecom. In holiday time dad looks after us. Michael helps dad do the painting while I make them a cup of tea. Mum gets home at midday to cook the lunch. After that we watch the Friday Film. Then I go to my nan's house to do organ practice. Lucy writes about life at the pub. She gets up at 7am with breakfast of cereal and coffee. At 11am the pub is opened up. It has recently been altered and modernised. At 2.30pm the pub closes and they often go to North Walsham shopping in the car. Her favourite evening meal is fish and chips. Then it's opening time at 7pm. Closing time is at 11pm.
